title: Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli help a homeless man to his feet in NYC
text:
They're currently enjoying the many sights, sounds and tastes of New York City.

But that didn't stop MAFS stars Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli being decent humans.

On Thursday, the reality TV couple were happy to stop and perform a random act of kindness when a homeless man fell to his knees in Manhattan.

Random act of kindness! MAFS stars Martha Kalifatidis (right) and Michael Brunelli (centre) helped a homeless man to his feet in New York City

The couple came across the man in SOHO are visiting lunch time hotspot Balthazar.

Martha wore a white Carolina Panthers T-shirt over a snake print skivvy with loosely fitted denim jeans.

She completed the casual-chic look with a freshly polished pair of leather boots.

Helping out: Michael extended his hand without giving it a second thought

The couple came across the man in Soho are visiting lunch time hotspot Balthazar

Casual chic: The couple dressed for comfort in matching blue jeans

The brunette babe kept her locks tied back behind her ears, and opted for little makeup.

Michael wore a blue flannel shirt, navy blue jeans and black joggers.

Since arriving in Gotham City, Martha and Michael have kept their Insta followers salivating at their many food stops.

Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the couple shared several hilarious videos of themselves as they enjoyed some of the cities famous culinary staples.

'Never make eye contact while eating a hot dog,' Martha cheekily captioned one photo.

A follow-up snap showed her again munching on the iconic snack, while directing her gaze towards the lens, with the accompanying caption: 'Unless it's really good.'
description: MAFS stars Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli are currently holidaying in the Big Apple. And on Thursday, the couple performed a random act of kindness.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
